title: Which YouTube channel provides songs without copyright? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello Everyone, Simple Answer is if you are a new youtuber and Dont have money to buy copyrighted music for you What you can do is go to Youtube studio - Audio Libary, were you will find Thousand of music and songs which are risk free and non copyrighted song. TIPS : Don’t fall in this trap if you are having a new youtube channel mostly new youtuber do this mistake most are the songs are copyrighted on there channel and you will have a chance to get copyright strike on your channel later on. Upvote this i will get motivate and help others who are finding this type of questions.
